app.title: Elekti
app.tagline: Batla setlhopha sa gago sa dipolotiki

landing.title: Batla Setlhopha Sa Gago Sa Dipolotiki
landing.subtitle: Araba dipotso tsa dipolotiki tsa gago o bone gore ke setlhopha sefe sa Afrika Borwa se se tsamaelanang le ditumelo tsa gago.
landing.aboutLink: Ithute ka ga mokgwa wa rona
landing.privacy: Dikarabo tsa gago di bolokwa fano mme ga di a kabelwana.

about.title: Ka ga Elekti
about.methodologyText: Elekti e dirisa mokgwa wa diphoto go tsamaisa dikakanyo tsa gago tsa dipolotiki le ditlhopha tsa dipolotiki tsa Afrika Borwa.
about.privacyText: Sepo sa gago se bothata jwa rona. Ga re boloka data ya motho ka noši noma di-quiz responses. Fela language preference ya gago e bolokilwe mo sediring sa gago. Di-quiz answers tsa gago di imetswe mo URL fa o ne o e abelane - ga go kgona go boloka mo serweng, ga go database, ga go lateleledisano. Re dirisa Cloudflare Web Analytics, e leng e tlotlang sephiri e leng e sa diriseng di-cookies, e sa lateleleng batho ka noši, noma e sa kgobokanyeng data ya motho ka noši. Dikakaretso tsa gago ke tsa gago go di abelana kgotsa go di boloka ka sethepo ka thotso go rata sa gago.
about.partiesText: Re akaretsa ditlhopha di le 11 tse dikgolo tsa dipolotiki tsa Afrika Borwa.
about.disclaimerText: Sediriso se ke sa tshedimosho fela mme ga se kgakololo ya go vouta.
about.dataSourcesText: Maemo a ditlhopha a theilwe mo dimanifesto tsa setšhaba.

anc.desc: African National Congress ke setlhopha se se busang kwa Afrika Borwa.

da.desc: Democratic Alliance e rotloetsa demokrasi ya bolokolohelo.

mk.desc: uMkhonto we Sizwe Party e itebaganya le diphetogo tsa ikonomi tse di tiileng.

eff.desc: Economic Freedom Fighters ke setlhopha sa molema o o kgolo.

ifp.desc: Inkatha Freedom Party e rotloetsa ditumelo tsa setso sa Zulu.

pa.desc: Patriotic Alliance e itebaganya le dilo tsa ba ba fallang kwa nageng.

vfplus.desc: Freedom Front Plus e emela dikgatlhego tsa Maafrikaner.

actionsa.desc: ActionSA ke setlhopha sa fa gare se se itebagantse le taolo e e sebedisanang.

acdp.desc: African Christian Democratic Party e rotloetsa ditumelo tsa Bokeresete.

ufc.desc: Unite for Change e itebaganya le go kopanya batho.

sacp.desc: South African Communist Party e emela bokomanisi.

udm.desc: United Democratic Movement e rotloetsa demokrasi ya loago, kopano, le dipholisi tse di sebetsang go lwantsha lehuma le go se lekane.

aljamah.desc: Al Jama-ah e emela ditumelo tsa boIslam mme e rotloetsa toka ya loago, puso e e nang le maitsholo, le ditshwanelo tsa batho ba ba gateletsweng.

atm.desc: African Transformation Movement e itebaganya le go lwantsha bosenyi, boeteledipele jo bo nang le maitsholo, le go fetola Afrika Borwa ka maikarabelo.

pf.desc: Patriotic Front e rotloetsa dipholisi tsa bosetshaba, boikemelo jwa ikonomi, le go baya pele dikgatlhego tsa baagi ba Afrika Borwa.

cope.desc: Congress of the People e rotloetsa demokrasi ya loago, puso e e siameng, le dipholisi tsa ikonomi tse di lekanyang kgolo le boiketlo jwa loago.

q1.text: Tsamaiso ya tlhokomelo ya botsogo ya batho yotlhe e e tshegediswang ke setšhaba (tsamaiso ya mofuta wa National Health Insurance) e tshwanetse go tlhamiwa go tlamela ka tlhokomelo ya motheo ya mahala go botlhe.

q2.text: Thuto e e kwa godimo e tshwanetse go nna ya mahala go baithuti botlhe (ga go na dituelo), e seng fela thuso ya madi e e lekanyeditsweng.

q3.text: Puso e tshwanetse go tsenya mo tirisong mpho ya madi ya motheo e e sa beakanyeng mabaka go baagi botlhe, le fa go tlhokega lekgetho le le kwa godimo kgotsa go adima.

q4.text: Puso e tshwanetse go tlhatlosa lekgetho go bahumegi go tšhegetsa mananeo a setšhaba a a atolositsweng (botsogo, thuto le dimpho tsa loago).

q5.text: Puso e tshwanetse go beeletsa thata mo matlong a setšhaba a malapa a a senang madi a mantsi.

q6.text: Peeletso ya matlo a setšhaba e tshwanetse go nna kgakololo le fa go tlhokega go kgaoganya ditirelo tse dingwe tsa setšhaba.

q7.text: Tlhabololo ya magae le tshegetso ya temo (go akaretsa ditshegetso le motheo wa balemirui ba bannye) e tshwanetse go amogela matlole a mantsi a puso.

q8.text: Badiri ba tshwanetse go nna le ditshwanelo tse di nonofileng tsa go itlhagisa le go buisana ka tlhamalalo le bahiri kwa ntle ga go tsena ga puso.

q9.text: BEE le go dira ka tshiamo go tshwanetse go tswelela e le dikgakololo tsa botlhokwa tsa puso go lokisa go se lekane ga morafe le ikonomi ga histori.

q10.text: Go tsewa ga lefatshe la poraefete kwa ntle ga tuelo ya boleng jwa mebaraka go tshwanetse go dumelwa ka fa tlase ga molao go potlakisa petoloelo ya lefatshe.

q11.text: Molaotheo o tshwanetse go fetolwa fa go tlhokega go potlakisa phetogo le go kgontsha kabo e e tswelelang.

q12.text: Afrika Borwa e tshwanetse go baya kgakololo ditumalano tsa kgwebo tse di sireletsang madirelo a selegae, le fa go raya ditlhotlhwa tse di kwa godimo tsa bareki.

q13.text: Naga e tshwanetse go baya kgakololo peeletso mo motlakaseng o o mpshafaditsweng (letsatsi, phefo) go feta go atolosa motlakase wa magala.

q14.text: Kgato e e nonofileng kgatlhanong le bosenyi (le fa e tsenya tiragalo mo baeteledipele ba jaana) e botlhokwa go feta go boloka botsitso jwa sepolotiki.

q15.text: Go fokotsa bosenyi, puso e tshwanetse go tlhoma mogopolo mo kotlhaong e e thata go feta go lebagana le mabaka a loago jaaka lehuma.

q16.text: Bafaladi ba ba sa dumelwang ba tshwanetse go lelekiwa le taolo e e tiileng ya moedi go sireletswa ditiro tsa selegae le dithuso.

q17.text: Puso e tshwanetse go tlhama mananeo a magolo a ditiro tsa setšhaba le mananeo a go netefatsa tiro go fokotsa tlhoka tiro.

q18.text: Thoto ya poraefete le ditshwanelo tsa dikgwebo tse dinnye di tshwanetse go sirelediwa ka thata kgatlhanong le go tsewa le melawana e e bokete.

q19.text: Puso e tshwanetse go nonotsha tshireletso ya molao ya batho ba LGBTQ+ le go tlhabolola ditshwanelo tse di lekana tsa baagi.

q20.text: Boikemelo jwa tsamaiso ya tshiamiso le marapo a a tshwereng molato bo tshwanetse go sirelediwa ka thata, le fa seo se fokotsa bofefo jwa tsamaiso.

q21.text: Afrika Borwa e tshwanetse go baya kgakololo tirisanommogo e e pharaletseng ya dinaga tse dintsi ya dipolotiki le kgwebo (le EU, US le baagisani ba Afrika) go feta go tshwaragana bogolo le ditlhopha tse dingwe tsa sepolotiki.
q21.category: pholisi ya dinaga tsa kwa ntle

q22.text: Puso e tshwanetse go atolosa maatla a tlhatlhobo le a phitlhelelo ya data a tsamaiso ya molao go lwantsha bosenyi le boqhekanyetsi, le fa go fokotsa sephiri.
